english_example_sentence: I will stand until the finish line in this difficult marathon.
russian_example_sentence: Я буду стоять до финиша в этом сложном марафоне.
turkish_example_sentence: Bu zorlu maratonda bitiş çizgisine kadar ayakta duracağım.
